About ME

I am Sipeng Yang, an Associate Researcher at the Hangzhou Research Institute of AI and Holographic Technology.

I received my Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from the State Key Laboratory of CAD&CG, Zhejiang University, in 2024, where I was advised by Professor Xiaogang Jin.

My research focuses on developing lightweight supersampling algorithms for real-time rendering on mobile devices, with the goal of achieving high-quality rendering at low sampling rates. This work has significant applications in smartphone gaming and interactive graphics.

I am also interested in deep learning and geometry processing for computer graphics and visual computing.

Email: sipengyang@zju.edu.cn

Last updated: August 2025
